document.full_text: david lodge is on the front line in the fight to keep asian carp out of the great lakes. some members of industry groups say he has moved from scientist to advocate.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: notre dame professor leads effort to keep asian carp out of great lakes
lines_and_colors: david lodge is on the front line in the fight to keep asian carp out of the great lakes. some members of industry groups say he has moved from scientist to advocate.
